forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 85. South wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 67. Southwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
Boston awakens today under a canopy of sunlit tranquility, as the afternoon unfolds in radiant hues with temperatures gently rising toward the mid-eighties. A warm breeze drifts through the city, delivering whispers of the south, playfully ruffling the leaves of the trees and hinting at the vibrance of summer still lingering in the air. Tonight, as the sun dips below the horizon, the sky will shift to a tapestry of soft blues, inviting a cooler embrace for the evening's repose, as temperatures settle into a comfortable 67 degrees. 

For those venturing outside, this is the perfect invitation to don light layers—perhaps a short-sleeved shirt complemented by a breezy linen jacket for the evening chill. The pleasant weather encourages a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a quiet moment spent savoring a book in one of Boston's lush parks. Alternatively, one might prefer to enjoy an open-air café, the clinking of glasses mingling with laughter as the day rolls gracefully into night. Each moment becomes a simple joy in this lovely September day, subtly reminding us of the beauty in the fleeting warmth of summer.
